title: Currency Converter
summary: Currency converter calculator and exchange rates list for phone / tablet
description: Currency exchange rate calculator and exchange rates list for android. Download “Currency Converter” and get world's foreign currencies conversion rates.Easy to use for conversion of 15 foreign currencies at once. “Currency Converter”  has an exchange rates lists, and graphs with historic data. ★ Instant conversion just by typing the numbers. ★ Calculator for currencies for math. Result is instantly converted to all currencies. ★ Add new currency code and run the update. App will download fresh exchange rate. ★ Currency converter app runs on phones and tablets.★ Convert 15 currencies at once★ Whole world currencies and precious metals.★ Works in offline mode.★ Manually add any currency not in exchange rates list.
descriptionHTML:
Currency exchange rate calculator and exchange rates list for android. Download “Currency Converter” and get world's foreign currencies conversion rates.

Easy to use for conversion of 15 foreign currencies at once. “Currency Converter” has an exchange rates lists, and graphs with historic data.

★ Instant conversion just by typing the numbers.
★ Calculator for currencies for math. Result is instantly converted to all currencies.
★ Add new currency code and run the update. App will download fresh exchange rate.
★ Currency converter app runs on phones and tablets.
★ Convert 15 currencies at once
★ Whole world currencies and precious metals.
★ Works in offline mode.
★ Manually add any currency not in exchange rates list.
comments: Vry helpful when am travelling... can't b cheated on currency rates on daily basis... right now in India... guy wanted to pay me 1$=60 rupees but l said it's 62 r. .. no arguments...!!!
Not the easiest way.. also would like historical data.
Great app! Can't count the number of times I've used it in the fly during my travels to different countries.
It's a simple but intuitive apps that you never gonna miss it. It's giving you the very accurate and fast information about the international currency movement.
Direct to meaning- ad or small % accuracy is acceptable. Only to estimate as tourist not investor or manipulation..
Extremely reliable and precise currency rates. The ads are give me no issues and I totally love the instant response I get while calculating!
recentChanges: - Fixed minor issues reported by users
